typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	RowCount as integer (20)
}
source(output(
		id as short,
		{Maket#Id} as short,
		{Channel#Id} as double,
		Data as string,
		{KPI#Id} as short
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source1
source1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		Column_1 as string,
		Column_2 as string,
		Column_3 as string
	),
	filePattern:'emp[n]',
	umask: 0022,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('roundRobin', ($RowCount/10))) ~> sink1
